title: Love Data Week 9.-13.2.2026
content: Love Data Week 9.-13.2.2026 uvirolai@helsinki.fi Wed, 04/02/2026 - 15:47 The Nordic Love Data Week 2026 offers a wide range of online events organized by research data management experts from Nordic universities. Nordic Love Data Week 2026 In February 9–13, 2026 you have the opportunity to improve your skills in research data management by attending online zoom sessions. title: How Old Are Nightshades? An MSc Thesis in Plant Evolution
content: How Old Are Nightshades? An MSc Thesis in Plant Evolution poczai@helsinki.fi Tue, 03/02/2026 - 16:30 How old are plant lineages, and how do we estimate their evolutionary timelines? This MSc project uses molecular phylogenetics and time-calibrated trees to explore diversification patterns in a well-studied group of nightshade plants. Timing the Evolution of Solanum Section AndrocerasAn excellent opportunity to work with colleagues at the Evolutionary Biology Centre, Uppsala University, including...

title: Luonnontieteellinen museo suljetaan huoltoviikon ajaksi
content: The Natural History Museum will be closed during the maintenance week johanemi@helsinki.fi Fri, 09/01/2026 - 14:10 The museum will be closed during the maintenance week, Mon–Fri, 12–16 January 2026. The doors will reopen on Saturday, 17 January. The Natural History Museum will be closed during the maintenance week, Mon–Fri, 12–16 January. title: Kotina metsä -näyttely tuo luonnonmetsän keskelle Helsinkiä
content: Forest Home – Exhibition brings a natural forest to the heart of Helsinki johanemi@helsinki.fi Fri, 30/05/2025 - 14:09 In Finland, natural forests have become a rarity – and for many, they remain unfamiliar. The Forest Home exhibition invites visitors to discover them through photography, video installations and scientific specimens.
